Customer List

  • {{ customer.name }} - {{ customer.email }} - {{ customer.phoneNumber }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CustomerService, Customer } from './services/customer.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: [] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { customers: Customer[] = []; constructor(private customerService: CustomerService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.loadCustomers(); } loadCustomers(): void { this.customerService.getAllCustomers().subscribe( (data) => { this.customers = data; }, (error) => { console.error('Error loading customers', error); } ); } }
